
import sys

for i in range(int(sys.stdin.readline())):
    vals=map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split())
    data=vals[1:]
    if vals[0]==0:
        if min(data)==0:
            print data.index(min(data))+1
        else:
            print 10
    elif min(data)!=0:
        res=str(data.index(min(data))+1)
        for i in range(min(data)):
            res+=str(data.index(min(data))+1)
        print min(10**(vals[0]+1),int(res))
    else:
        print data.index(min(data))+1
